00062 class SigmoidModel : public Model
00063 {
00064 public:
00065         SigmoidModel(double A = 1.0, double B = 0.0)
00066         {
00067                 inputDimension = 1;
00068                 outputDimension = 1;
00069 
00070                 parameter.resize(2);
00071                 parameter(0) = A;
00072                 parameter(1) = B;
00073         }
00074 
00075         ~SigmoidModel()
00076         {
00077         }
00078 
00079 
00080         inline double get_A()
00081         {
00082                 return parameter(0);
00083         }
00084 
00085         inline double get_B()
00086         {
00087                 return parameter(1);
00088         }
00089 
00090         void model(const Array<double>& input, Array<double> &output)
00091         {
00092                 if (input.ndim() == 1)
00093                 {
00094                         SIZE_CHECK(input.dim(0) == 1);
00095                         output.resize(1, false);
00096                         output(0) = 1.0 / (1.0 + exp(parameter(0) * input(0) + parameter(1)));
00097                 }
00098                 else if (input.ndim() == 2)
00099                 {
00100                         int j, jc = input.dim(0);
00101                         SIZE_CHECK(input.dim(1) == 1);
00102                         output.resize(jc, false);
00103                         for (j=0; j<jc; j++)
00104                         {
00105                                 output(j) = 1.0 / (1.0 + exp(parameter(0) * input(j, 0) + parameter(1)));
00106                         }
00107                 }
00108                 else throw("[SigmoidModel::model] invalid number of dimensions.");
00109         }
00110 
00111         void modelDerivative(const Array<double>& input, Array<double>& derivative)
00112         {
00113                 if (input.ndim() == 1)
00114                 {
00115                         SIZE_CHECK(input.dim(0) == 1);
00116                         derivative.resize(2, false);
00117                         double e = exp(parameter(0) * input(0) + parameter(1));
00118                         double f = 1.0 / (1.0 + e);
00119                         double d = -f*f*e;
00120                         derivative(0) = d*input(0);
00121                         derivative(1) = d;
00122                 }
00123                 else if (input.ndim() == 2)
00124                 {
00125                         int j, jc = input.dim(0);
00126                         SIZE_CHECK(input.dim(1) == 1);
00127                         derivative.resize(jc, 2, false);
00128                         for (j=0; j<jc; j++)
00129                         {
00130                                 double e = exp(parameter(0) * input(0) + parameter(1));
00131                                 double f = 1.0 / (1.0 + e);
00132                                 double d = -f*f*e;
00133                                 derivative(j, 0) = d*input(0);
00134                                 derivative(j, 1) = d;
00135                         }
00136                 }
00137                 else throw("[SigmoidModel::modelDerivative] invalid number of dimensions.");
00138         }
00139 
00140         void modelDerivative(const Array<double>& input, Array<double>& output, Array<double>& derivative)
00141         {
00142                 if (input.ndim() == 1)
00143                 {
00144                         SIZE_CHECK(input.dim(0) == 1);
00145                         derivative.resize(2, false);
00146                         output.resize(1, false);
00147                         double e = exp(parameter(0) * input(0) + parameter(1));
00148                         double f = 1.0 / (1.0 + e);
00149                         double d = -f*f*e;
00150                         output(0) = f;
00151                         derivative(0) = d*input(0);
00152                         derivative(1) = d;
00153                 }
00154                 else if (input.ndim() == 2)
00155                 {
00156                         int j, jc = input.dim(0);
00157                         SIZE_CHECK(input.dim(1) == 1);
00158                         derivative.resize(jc, 2, false);
00159                         output.resize(jc, false);
00160                         for (j=0; j<jc; j++)
00161                         {
00162                                 double e = exp(parameter(0) * input(0) + parameter(1));
00163                                 double f = 1.0 / (1.0 + e);
00164                                 double d = -f*f*e;
00165                                 output(j) = f;
00166                                 derivative(j, 0) = d*input(0);
00167                                 derivative(j, 1) = d;
00168                         }
00169                 }
00170                 else throw("[SigmoidModel::modelDerivative] invalid number of dimensions.");
00171         }
